elements.title: Day 7 Survey
elements.text: Thank you for your participation over the last 7 days. This survey is similar to the first one and will take approximately 10 minutes to complete.

The next couple of pages consist of a list of two opposite feelings, thoughts, or behaviors. Use the slider to choose where you generally fall between each pair of opposites. For example, if you are someone who gets distracted or has trouble focusing, you would move the slider closer to the “distracted” side.
What would you change about the game-like tasks you completed?
What would you change about the questions you completed?
What do you recommend we give people feedback on after they complete the 7-day period?
What would you say to someone who was having trouble resisting the temptation to act in an unhealthy way in the moment?
Would you continue to use this app if it gave you feedback on your behavior?
Please complete all the games one after the other, like during your baseline assessment.

formattedText.template:
### Thank you for using the Digital Marshmallow Test app!


###### Please tap here to send us a blank email, allowing us to know that you have completed the 7-day test. You will be compensated $25 via Amazon gift card **within one week**.

elements.errorMessage: We're unable to compose the email. Please notify rvitale@northwell.edu
